name: CrazXRacing
description:
The Best Speed Sensation you've ever experienced!

Race your extremely powerful car on no less than 10 different tracks!
Be careful! You have competition, and the difficulty keeps increasing!
Many Ghost Drivers on the road try to decrease your speed.
But, the blue one gives you a "Boost Bonus" to change your XCar to a really rocket and the Green gives you a "Damage Bonus".
You will certainly need to brake during your race! Simply touch the screen to do that.

Hit Checkpoints to earn Extended Time!
Customize your XCar, and become the Top Driver!
You have the possibility to try all races before compete.

Your time is recorded for each race.
Share your score online and try to stay in the world ranking!
Your location is automatically detected to display the flag of your country in the international scores table.
So you can compete with players around the World!
You can see the rankings at any time by clicking on the logo "World High Scores".

••• Game Features •••

• Incredible Speed sensation
• Great arcade physics
• Huge jumping
• Spectacular SFX
• Customize your XCar
• Training mode
• Realistic sound environment
• Some Bonus to increase your speed and reduce your XCar damage
• Select the difficulty level
• Use accelerometer or virtual arrows to control your XCar
• Upload your Score and enter in the World Ranking
